data.text:
@LucyAnnF Thank you for that positive feedback Lucy Ann. It was nice to hear.

Best regards /Anna

@1313consa Hej! du kan skriva till oss via vår livechatt på SAS hemsida eller skriva till oss på messenger eller ringa till oss: +46 8 797 40 00 , Vi kan ta en titt på ditt konto där och se om vi hittar något! Vänliga hälsningar, Jonna.

urls.title: Contact forms
urls.description: Report a Login issue. If you' re having trouble logging in or with your password, please contact SAS Customer

data.text: @Basti_133 Hello, a travel voucher is only refundable if it was requested after flights in your booking got cancelled, if you request a voucher and the flights are not cancelled the voucher will not be refundable. Please advise your friend to contact us on Messenger or Live-chat for help.

data.text:
@zlatan1 Hej! Det är ny information som träder i kraft från och med idag så vår hemsida bör bli uppdaterad inom kort där du kan läsa lite närmare om detta.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

data.text:
@ManniGee1971 Hi! Please contact our customer service so that we can check what has happened to your refund. You can contact us on Live Chat, Phone or by Facebook Messenger. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj
Kind regards, Rebecka

domain.name: Entities [Entity Service]
domain.description: Entity Service top level domain, every item that is in Entity Service should be in this domain

data.text:
@zlatan1 Hej, servicen för att ta med sig en hund för emotionellt stöd finns inte kvar från och med den 1:a juni 2021. Om du vill ha med dig din hund måste den numera åka som en hund i Kabinen eller i Lastutrymmet beroende på hur stor din hund är.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

@stavanger_sol Hi, you can check the general information we have when flying with us here: https://t.co/Hs1p3jTzMK If you have further questions I suggest you to check with the US authorities on what rules and regulations apply for you.
Kind regards, Rebecka

@cterjesen Hej! Om du får SMS från oss som du inte vill ha så kan du svara på SMSet med instruktionerna som finns i det för att se till att du inte får den typen av sms i framtiden. Du kan även logga in på ditt konto för att ta bort oönskad information från oss.
Vänliga hälsningar, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

urls.title: Travel and Service Updates
urls.description: We are Scandinavian by name and nature and our operational priorities are: Safety, Punctuality and Care »

data.text:
@larsingemattias Hej! 
SAS kräver inte att passagerare är testade för att få resa. 
Jag rekomenderar att du läser följande länk https://t.co/gml5ZaEizi under "ENTRY RESTRICTIONS" 
Med vänlig hälsning Liv.

@nembro78 @nembro78 I don't have any information regarding that right now. But keep yourself updated on our website. If you search for a flight, I recommend using the calendar instead of specific dates to get an overview of available tickets per month.
Best regards, Mikael.

@psimma Hej @psimma jag skulle rekommendera dig att dölja ditt inlägg då ett vouchernummer är en värdehandling. Kontakta oss gärna via facebook messenger, chatten eller telefon så kan vi kolla upp statusen för din voucher.
Med vänlig hälsning, Mikael.

urls.title: Voucher – Travel the world
urls.description: With a SAS Voucher you can pay for flights, travel extras like lounge access and much more online. How it works »

data.text:
@Steph_Btl @Steph_Btl right now you don't need a covid test when you're travelling domestic in Norway. Except if you're travelling to Svalbard. Please keep yourself updated, because it can change.
Best regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@jjjosefinej @jjjosefinej yes, to both. You can choose to get a voucher up until 72 hours before scheduled outbound departure. You can read more about it here: https://t.co/VYID7EB49S
Best regards, Mikael.

@maxialexx Hi, 

We have not gotten any info that it is planned for the moment, but if it is scheduled it will be added to our destination page https://t.co/55SkVLHyhS

Regards,
Peter

@NikolaWalga Hi, 

We can unfortunately not see why it can not be downloaded in advance. If the message is that it need to be handled at the airport,  there is no way to get it beforehand. 

Regards,
Peter

data.text: @Ecast3 To change you booking you can call us, the list for our phone numbers are here: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj and we can help you to change your booking! Kind regards, Jonna.

urls.title: Kontakt oss – Finn ditt lokale telefonnummer
urls.description: Hvis du trenger å kontakte oss, finner du lokale telefonnumre til kundeservice, SAS Corporate Sales Center og SAS Group Sales her »

data.text: @NiaMoore93 Hi! If you are waiting on a refund you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at your booking there and help you. Kind regards, Jonna.
@Ecast3 Hi! it does not matter if you can not accept the new flight time online, it will accept by itself if you do not decide to make your own change within 5 days. Kind regards, Jonna.

@Squish69 @Squish69 you should be able to add it via "My bookings" on our website. If it doesn't work, please contact us and we will help you add your Star Alliance number to your booking.
Best regards, Mikael.

Kind regards, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@murlctt Hi! From June 1st the service to bring Emotional Support Animals on our flights will permanently closed. If you have an ESAN already registered to your ticket, then it will remain, however no new requests will be added to flights that fly after 1st of June.
Kind regards, Rebecka
@MEDIABLIKK Hej! om du inte vill få sms från SAS längre kan du bara skriva: "EXIT" och skicka till: 41716151 . Med vänliga hälsningar, Jonna.

@iLavaUcakes Hi! yes you can add your TSA  number to your reservation. This has to be done 72 hours prior to travel for all passengers travelling to/from or via the US. For bookings made within 72 hours of departure it has to be done at the time of booking. Kind regards, Jonna.

data.text: @paolopascolo Hi! you can write to us via our live-chat on SAS webpage or write to us on messenger, We can take a look at that and help you there. Kind regards, Jonna.

@GymSwedeAnto Hi! We do not have any information about which flights will fly over Belarus. We have contact with both the Scandinavian and European aviation authorities and we follow the advice and recommendations given by them. Our priority has and will always be the safety of our passengers.

@Itslissy1 Hi! Unfortunately, we do not know how likely it is if a trip will be canceled or not. If you have not received any information that a trip is canceled, it will go as usual. If you have a booking you can write to us on our livechat or messenger, we can look at your booking there!
@stam_daan Hey! you can write to us via our live chat on SAS's website or write to us on messenger. We can take a look at your voucher there and help you. Best regards, Jonna.

data.text:
@davidmccleery Hi, generally you won't be able to book flights at most 361 days in advance - if the flights are available that early. But please contact our support so we can see what options we have for you and your voucher. https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj 
Kind regards, Rebecka

Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@sebsasto @sebsasto if you contacted us a while ago, I would advice you to contact us again so we can check the options that are available right now.
Otherwise please send your feedback to our customer care department via this link: https://t.co/OzrIxYNv63 We appreciate it a lot!

@sebsasto Hi @sebsasto please contact us via Facebook messenger, the chat or phone so we can check what kind of voucher you have.
Kind regards, Mikael.

data.text:
@Haynala Hello, when it is 24 hour refund it is usually done directly but it can take up to 5 bank days. You receive a refund notice to the e-mail that exists in the booking when it is handled. 

Best regards /Anna

Peter

data.text: @emiliaedelin Hi! I suggest you remove the Tweet as it contains personal details that could be exploited by someone un-authorized. However, the refund on this booking was processed today.  If you have further questions please contact us: https://t.co/b3QIqPk7bj Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text: @lynnehooper18 Hi, since your daughter received her delayed bag, I suggest to call the number found on her delayed bag report. You can also find all the phone numbers here: https://t.co/We1FdD7ZiM just make sure she call the airport where she filed the delayed bag report. Kind regards, Rebecka

data.text:
@lightfables Hello, to apply a voucher when booking please proceed with booking as usual at https://t.co/BlgfvicYhk and then in the payment stage you select "Add voucher" and enter your 10-digit voucher code. If it doesn't work please contact us on Messenger or live-chat.

// Anton.
